faq.FAQ: How much does a roof repair typically cost in [location]?
faq.Answer: Costs depend on the size and scope of the repair; we provide clear estimates after a quick inspection and explain the most cost-effective options.

faq.FAQ: When should I consider a full roof replacement in [location]?
faq.Answer: If shingles are curling, granules are missing, or there are multiple leaks, a replacement may be more economical than repeated repairs.

faq.Answer: Yes. We document damage, provide detailed estimates, and can work with your insurer to help the claim process go smoothly.
